amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 40 in the Congressional Record of June 19, 1996 to prohibit the use of funds appropriated in the bill for NASA's "Bion 11" and "Bion 12" projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 171 (Roll no. 280).
